Articles.Content:
Hi guys...

I seem to be having some trouble fulfilling a contract for the long solid booster and the parachute.

I launch a rocket basically of just a capsule, a long booster and a parachute. During flight, the conditions are met; all of the check marks are present.

And yet, the contract never fulfills.

What am I missing?

Thanks for the help

THC

Edited August 5, 2014 by THChess

It's not quite that simple. For parts like engines and parachutes, you need to activate the part by staging (spacebar) after all the conditions are met. A few parts like landing gear will have "Run Test" in the right-click menu. If you're not sure which kind of part you have, it does say what to do in the contract. It's not all fluff, just mostly.

At least you're not alone: Kurt made the same mistake.

http://youtu.be/vBTkZ8EWRa8

As he says, always read the contract.
